tool_description: Performs comprehensive grammar, spelling, and business writing style checks with suggestions for professional communication improvement.

text_content.description: Text content to check for grammar and style issues

check_level.description: Checking intensity: basic, standard, or comprehensive

business_context.description: Business context: internal, external, formal, or casual

auto_correct.description: Whether to automatically apply obvious corrections

error_messages: Empty text content: Provide text for grammar checking
Invalid check level: Use one of [basic, standard, comprehensive]
Invalid business context: Use one of [internal, external, formal, casual]

usage: Provide text_content and check_level for grammar analysis. Set business_context for appropriate style checking and enable auto_correct for immediate fixes.

corrected_text.description: Text with corrections applied (if auto_correct enabled)

grammar_issues.description: List of identified grammar and spelling issues
